title: Ticket #828: standard univ starter asserts and dumps core in expected code paths
description: The standard universe starter asserts and dumps core/stack trace in expected code paths such as communication failures. This results in wasted effort trying to track down bugs that don't exist. See #335 for an example where this appears to have happened.
remarks:
